Package eg.syntax

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Highlighter
    The interface to highlight text elements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attributes
    Defines static attribute sets for characters, each with the attributes foreground color and weight
    CSSHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for CSS
    HighlighterSelector
    The creation of a Highlighter selected based on the language
    HTMLHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for Html
    JavaHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for Java
    JavascriptHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for Javascript
    PerlHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for Perl
    RHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for R
    SyntaxConstants
    Constants for strings and characters used for searching text elements
    SyntaxHighlighter
    The syntax highlighting in the text contained in TextDocument
    SyntaxUtils
    Static variables and methods to search for text elements
    XMLHighlighter
    Syntax highlighting for xml
